trans-unit.source: Appendix: Messaging Exceptions
trans-unit.target: Appendix: Messaging Exceptions

trans-unit.source: This section lists the various exceptions generated by the <token>sb1</token> messaging API.
trans-unit.target: This section lists the various exceptions generated by the <token>sb1</token> messaging API.

trans-unit.source: This reference is subject to change, so check back for updates.
trans-unit.target: This reference is subject to change, so check back for updates.

trans-unit.source: Exception Categories
trans-unit.target: Exception Categories

trans-unit.source: The messaging APIs generate exceptions that can fall into the following categories, along with the associated action you can take to try to fix them:
trans-unit.target: The messaging APIs generate exceptions that can fall into the following categories, along with the associated action you can take to try to fix them:

trans-unit.source: User code error (<codeEntityReference>T:System.ArgumentException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.InvalidOperationException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.OperationCanceledException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException</codeEntityReference>).
trans-unit.target: User code error (<codeEntityReference>T:System.ArgumentException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.InvalidOperationException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.OperationCanceledException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException</codeEntityReference>).

trans-unit.source: General action: try to fix the code before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: General action: try to fix the code before proceeding.

trans-unit.source: Setup/configuration error (<codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingEntityNotFoundException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.UnauthorizedAccessException</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: Setup/configuration error (<codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingEntityNotFoundException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.UnauthorizedAccessException</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: General action: review your configuration and change if necessary.
trans-unit.target: General action: review your configuration and change if necessary.

trans-unit.source: Transient exceptions (<codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.ServerBusyException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingCommunicationException</codeEntityReference>).
trans-unit.target: Transient exceptions (<codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.ServerBusyException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingCommunicationException</codeEntityReference>).

trans-unit.source: General action: retry the operation or notify users.
trans-unit.target: General action: retry the operation or notify users.

trans-unit.source: Other exceptions (<codeEntityReference>T:System.Transactions.TransactionException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeoutException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessageLockLostException</codeEntityReference>/<codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.SessionLockLostException</codeEntityReference>).
trans-unit.target: Other exceptions (<codeEntityReference>T:System.Transactions.TransactionException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeoutException</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessageLockLostException</codeEntityReference>/<codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.SessionLockLostException</codeEntityReference>).

trans-unit.source: General action: you generally do not handle these exceptions to perform cleanup or aborts.
trans-unit.target: General action: you generally do not handle these exceptions to perform cleanup or aborts.

trans-unit.source: They might be used for tracing.
trans-unit.target: They might be used for tracing.

trans-unit.source: Exception Types
trans-unit.target: Exception Types

trans-unit.source: The following table lists messaging exception types, and their causes, and notes suggested action you can take.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists messaging exception types, and their causes, and notes suggested action you can take.

trans-unit.source: Exception Type
trans-unit.target: Exception Type

trans-unit.source: Description/Cause/Examples
trans-unit.target: Description/Cause/Examples

trans-unit.source: Suggested Action
trans-unit.target: Suggested Action

trans-unit.source: Note on automatic/immediate retry
trans-unit.target: Note on automatic/immediate retry

trans-unit.source: The server did not respond to the requested operation within the specified time which is controlled by <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactorySettings.OperationTimeout</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: The server did not respond to the requested operation within the specified time which is controlled by <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactorySettings.OperationTimeout</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: The server may have completed the requested operation.This can happen due to network or other infrastructure delays.
trans-unit.target: The server may have completed the requested operation.This can happen due to network or other infrastructure delays.

trans-unit.source: Check the system state for consistency and retry if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Check the system state for consistency and retry if necessary.

trans-unit.source: Retry might help in some cases; add retry logic to code.
trans-unit.target: Retry might help in some cases; add retry logic to code.

trans-unit.source: The requested user operation is not allowed within the server or service.
trans-unit.target: The requested user operation is not allowed within the server or service.

trans-unit.source: See the exception message for details.
trans-unit.target: See the exception message for details.

trans-unit.source: For example, <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.BrokeredMessage.Complete</codeEntityReference> will generate this exception if the message was received in <languageKeyword>ReceiveAndDelete</languageKeyword> mode.
trans-unit.target: For example, <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.BrokeredMessage.Complete</codeEntityReference> will generate this exception if the message was received in <languageKeyword>ReceiveAndDelete</languageKeyword> mode.

trans-unit.source: Check the code and the documentation.
trans-unit.target: Check the code and the documentation.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the requested operation is valid.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the requested operation is valid.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to invoke an operation on an object that has already been closed, aborted or disposed.In rare cases, the ambient transaction is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: An attempt is made to invoke an operation on an object that has already been closed, aborted or disposed.In rare cases, the ambient transaction is already disposed.

trans-unit.source: Check the code and make sure it does not invoke operations on a disposed object.
trans-unit.target: Check the code and make sure it does not invoke operations on a disposed object.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.TokenProvider</codeEntityReference> object could not acquire a token, the token is invalid, or the token does not contain the claims required to perform the operation.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.TokenProvider</codeEntityReference> object could not acquire a token, the token is invalid, or the token does not contain the claims required to perform the operation.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the token provider is created with the correct values.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the token provider is created with the correct values.

trans-unit.source: Check the configuration of the <token>ac2</token> service.
trans-unit.target: Check the configuration of the <token>ac2</token> service.

trans-unit.source: Retry might help in some cases; add retry logic to code.
trans-unit.target: Retry might help in some cases; add retry logic to code.

trans-unit.source: One or more arguments supplied to the method are invalid.
trans-unit.target: One or more arguments supplied to the method are invalid.

trans-unit.source: The URI supplied to <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.NamespaceManager</codeEntityReference> or <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactory.Create(System.Uri,Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactorySettings)</codeEntityReference> contains path segment(s).
trans-unit.target: The URI supplied to <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.NamespaceManager</codeEntityReference> or <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactory.Create(System.Uri,Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactorySettings)</codeEntityReference> contains path segment(s).

trans-unit.source: The URI scheme supplied to <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.NamespaceManager</codeEntityReference> or <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactory.Create(System.Uri,Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactorySettings)</codeEntityReference> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: The URI scheme supplied to <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.NamespaceManager</codeEntityReference> or <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactory.Create(System.Uri,Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingFactorySettings)</codeEntityReference> is invalid.

trans-unit.source: The property value is larger than 32KB.
trans-unit.target: The property value is larger than 32KB.

trans-unit.source: Check the calling code and make sure the arguments are correct.
trans-unit.target: Check the calling code and make sure the arguments are correct.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: Entity associated with the operation does not exist or it has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Entity associated with the operation does not exist or it has been deleted.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the entity exists.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the entity exists.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: Attempt to receive a message with a particular sequence number.
trans-unit.target: Attempt to receive a message with a particular sequence number.

trans-unit.source: This message is not found.
trans-unit.target: This message is not found.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the message has not been received already.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the message has not been received already.

trans-unit.source: Check the deadletter queue to see if the message has been deadlettered.
trans-unit.target: Check the deadletter queue to see if the message has been deadlettered.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: Client is not able to establish a connection to <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: Client is not able to establish a connection to <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the supplied host name is correct and the host is reachable.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the supplied host name is correct and the host is reachable.

trans-unit.source: Retry might help if there are intermittent connectivity issues.
trans-unit.target: Retry might help if there are intermittent connectivity issues.

trans-unit.source: Service is not able to process the request at this time.
trans-unit.target: Service is not able to process the request at this time.

trans-unit.source: Client can wait for a period of time, then retry the operation.
trans-unit.target: Client can wait for a period of time, then retry the operation.

trans-unit.source: Client may retry after certain interval.
trans-unit.target: Client may retry after certain interval.

trans-unit.source: If a retry results in a different exception, check retry behavior of that exception.
trans-unit.target: If a retry results in a different exception, check retry behavior of that exception.

trans-unit.source: Lock token associated with the message has expired, or the lock token is not found.
trans-unit.target: Lock token associated with the message has expired, or the lock token is not found.

trans-unit.source: Dispose the message.
trans-unit.target: Dispose the message.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: Lock associated with this session is lost.
trans-unit.target: Lock associated with this session is lost.

trans-unit.source: Abort the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessageSession</codeEntityReference> object.
trans-unit.target: Abort the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessageSession</codeEntityReference> object.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: Generic messaging exception that may be thrown in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: Generic messaging exception that may be thrown in the following cases:

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to create a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.QueueClient</codeEntityReference> using a name or path that belongs to a different entity type (for example, a topic).
trans-unit.target: An attempt is made to create a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.QueueClient</codeEntityReference> using a name or path that belongs to a different entity type (for example, a topic).

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to send a message larger than 256KB.
trans-unit.target: An attempt is made to send a message larger than 256KB.

trans-unit.source: The server or service encountered an error during processing of the request.
trans-unit.target: The server or service encountered an error during processing of the request.

trans-unit.source: Please see the exception message for details.
trans-unit.target: Please see the exception message for details.

trans-unit.source: This is usually a transient exception.
trans-unit.target: This is usually a transient exception.

trans-unit.source: Check the code and ensure that only serializable objects are used for the message body (or use a custom serializer).
trans-unit.target: Check the code and ensure that only serializable objects are used for the message body (or use a custom serializer).

trans-unit.source: Check the documentation for the supported value types of the properties and only use supported types.
trans-unit.target: Check the documentation for the supported value types of the properties and only use supported types.

trans-unit.source: Check the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingException.IsTransient</codeEntityReference> property.
trans-unit.target: Check the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.MessagingException.IsTransient</codeEntityReference> property.

trans-unit.source: If it is <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>, you can retry the operation.
trans-unit.target: If it is <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword>, you can retry the operation.

trans-unit.source: Retry behavior is undefined and might not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry behavior is undefined and might not help.

trans-unit.source: Attempt to create an entity with a name that is already used by another entity in that <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: Attempt to create an entity with a name that is already used by another entity in that <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: Delete the existing entity or choose a different name for the entity to be created.
trans-unit.target: Delete the existing entity or choose a different name for the entity to be created.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: The messaging entity has reached its maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: The messaging entity has reached its maximum allowable size.

trans-unit.source: Create space in the entity by receiving messages from the entity or its sub-queues.
trans-unit.target: Create space in the entity by receiving messages from the entity or its sub-queues.

trans-unit.source: Retry might help if messages have been removed in the meantime.
trans-unit.target: Retry might help if messages have been removed in the meantime.

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> returns this exception if you attempt to create an invalid rule action.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> returns this exception if you attempt to create an invalid rule action.

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> attaches this exception to a deadlettered message if an error occurs while processing the rule action for that message.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> attaches this exception to a deadlettered message if an error occurs while processing the rule action for that message.

trans-unit.source: Check the rule action for correctness.
trans-unit.target: Check the rule action for correctness.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> returns this exception if you attempt to create an invalid filter.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> returns this exception if you attempt to create an invalid filter.

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> attaches this exception to a deadlettered message if an error occurred while processing the filter for that message.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> attaches this exception to a deadlettered message if an error occurred while processing the filter for that message.

trans-unit.source: Check the filter for correctness.
trans-unit.target: Check the filter for correctness.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: Attempt to accept a session with a specific session ID, but the session is currently locked by another client.
trans-unit.target: Attempt to accept a session with a specific session ID, but the session is currently locked by another client.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the session is unlocked by other clients.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the session is unlocked by other clients.

trans-unit.source: Retry might help if the session has been released in the interim.
trans-unit.target: Retry might help if the session has been released in the interim.

trans-unit.source: Too many operations are part of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Too many operations are part of the transaction.

trans-unit.source: Reduce the number of operations that are part of this transaction.
trans-unit.target: Reduce the number of operations that are part of this transaction.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: Request for a runtime operation on a disabled entity.
trans-unit.target: Request for a runtime operation on a disabled entity.

trans-unit.source: Activate the entity.
trans-unit.target: Activate the entity.

trans-unit.source: Retry might help if the entity has been activated in the interim.
trans-unit.target: Retry might help if the entity has been activated in the interim.

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> returns this exception if you send a message to a topic that has pre-filtering enabled and none of the filters match.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> returns this exception if you send a message to a topic that has pre-filtering enabled and none of the filters match.

trans-unit.source: Make sure at least one filter matches.
trans-unit.target: Make sure at least one filter matches.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: A message payload exceeds the 256K limit.
trans-unit.target: A message payload exceeds the 256K limit.

trans-unit.source: Note that the 256k limit is the total message size, which can include system properties and any .NET overhead.
trans-unit.target: Note that the 256k limit is the total message size, which can include system properties and any .NET overhead.

trans-unit.source: Reduce the size of the message payload, then retry the operation.
trans-unit.target: Reduce the size of the message payload, then retry the operation.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: The ambient transaction (<codeEntityReference>P:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current</codeEntityReference>) is invalid.
trans-unit.target: The ambient transaction (<codeEntityReference>P:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current</codeEntityReference>) is invalid.

trans-unit.source: It may have been completed or aborted.
trans-unit.target: It may have been completed or aborted.

trans-unit.source: Inner exception may provide additional information.
trans-unit.target: Inner exception may provide additional information.

trans-unit.source: Retry will not help.
trans-unit.target: Retry will not help.

trans-unit.source: An operation is attempted on a transaction that is in doubt, or an attempt is made to commit the transaction and the transaction becomes in doubt.
trans-unit.target: An operation is attempted on a transaction that is in doubt, or an attempt is made to commit the transaction and the transaction becomes in doubt.

trans-unit.source: You application must handle this exception (as a special case), as the transaction may have already been committed.
trans-unit.target: You application must handle this exception (as a special case), as the transaction may have already been committed.
